value:
Askr is so pretty. It reminds me Ylisse
during peacetime... Let's do our best
to protect this kingdom. We have to!

In the future I'm from, my mother and
I promised to make a lance together
when she returned from battle.$k$pBut before she could fulfill that
promise, she...

Whoa, whoa, whoa... You're patrolling
again? You'll wear yourself out at this
rate! Leave this to Cynthia the Hero!

You don't say anything special when
you summon Heroes? You really
need a cool catchphrase!$k$pSomething like... "Come forth, my
Hero!" What do you think of that?
Feel free to use it.

Let's see, what should I do for my
next entrance... Showering myself in
flower petals would be cool...$k$pBut explosions are pretty cool, too.
Hey, maybe you could fire off your
divine weapon to announce me?

Wings of Justice soaring over the
battlefield... It's Cynthia, here to
deliver a message!$k$pFriendship is the greatest source of
power for those who stand against
evil!

Look upon my might, ye wicked,
and despair!

Battlemaiden Cynthia ups her
game!

Eek... Being a hero is harder than
I thought.

Thanks for the extra power. I'll
become a great hero! Just watch!

I am Cynthia, hero of justice and
daughter of legendary pegasus knight
Sumia! Evil doers shall be punished!

I've been doing some thinking, and I
came up with a cool way for the Order
of Heroes to take the battlefield!$k$pOK, so, picture this... We start with
me, right? High up on a mountain,
showering Heroes with flower petals.$k$pThen, boom! You enter! You pose in
the center of the group and raise your
divine weapon as you declare—!$k$pHuh? You think the enemy would
strike before all this played out? Well,
I guess you have a point...$k$pI wanted to come up with this idea as
a way to thank you, but I guess it's no
good. On to plan B!$k$pWhich is just me saying... Thank you
for giving me this power, and for
calling me a Hero, and for...$k$pWell, for generally looking out for me.$k$pI still have a long way to go, and I may
be sort of clumsy, but... Someday, I
will be the Wings of Justice!$k$pAnd when that day comes, I just know
you and I will look so cool together
in battle!
えい！
はあっ！
ひゃあっ！
I'll remember that.
Okay, you got this...
Time to pay!
I am the Wings of Justice!
An end to evil!
Was I...a hero?
Heehee
I'm trying to come up with a cool way to make an entrance. Help me out!
No matter how fearsome the foe, Cynthia—the One-Woman Onslaught—will never shrink from the challenge!
I like it here. It's nice to be called a Hero.
The Order of Heroes is so cool, so...heroic!
Isn't this pegasus beautiful? She was my mother's. Y'know...back when... Yeah.
I'll always remember the promise my mother made. Always.
I fight to save the world—any world! My hope is to become a true hero, even if nobody notices me doing it!
Yup!
Here goes nothin'!
Easy-peasy!
